text: Kay Lertsittichai (; also known under the pseudonym Kayavine, born 12 December 1996) is a Thai YouTuber and actor. He began making YouTube videos in 2016 and has more than one million subscribers . He recently portrayed a main role as Gunkan in GMMTV's Who Are You (2020). == Early life and education == Kay was born in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand. He started his secondary education in where he got the opportunity to become an international exchange student to Guilford High School in Illinois, United States. In 2019, he graduated with a bachelor's degree in mathematics with emphasis on actuarial science from University of Wisconsin–Whitewater. == Filmography == === Television === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Role ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Notes ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | |- ! scope="row" | 2019 | Wolf | Koji | Guest role | style="text-align: center;" | |- ! scope="row" | 2020 | Who Are You | Gunkan | Main role | style="text-align: center;" | |} == References == == External links == * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Thai YouTubers Category:21st-century Thai male actors Category:Thai male actors Category:Thai male television actors Category:People from Nakhon Pathom Province Category:University of Wisconsin–Whitewater alumni Kay
title: Kay Lertsittichai
